verses.verse: And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> unto his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Gather yourselves <S%H622>together<s%>, that I may <S%H5046>tell<s%> you that which shall happen <S%H7122>to<s%> you in the <S%H319>last<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>.
Gather yourselves <S%H6908>together<s%>, and <S%H8085>hear<s%>, you <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>; and <S%H8085>listen<s%> unto <S%H3478>Israel<s%> your <S%H1>father<s%>.

<S%H7205>Reuben<s%>, you are my <S%H1060>firstborn<s%>, my <S%H3581>might<s%>, and the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of my <S%H202>strength<s%>, the <S%H3499>excellency<s%> of <S%H7613>dignity<s%>, and the <S%H3499>excellency<s%> of <S%H5794>power<s%>:

<S%H6349>Unstable<s%> as <S%H4325>water<s%>, you shall not <S%H3498>excel<s%>; because you went <S%H5927>up<s%> to your <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H4904>bed<s%>; then defiled <S%H2490>you<s%> <S%H5927>it<s%>: he went up to my <S%H3326>couch<s%>.
<S%H8095>Simeon<s%> and <S%H3878>Levi<s%> are <S%H251>brothers<s%>; <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of <S%H2555>cruelty<s%> are in their <S%H4380>swords<s%>.

O my <S%H5315>soul<s%>, <S%H935>come<s%> not you into their <S%H5475>secret<s%>; unto their <S%H6951>assembly<s%>, my <S%H3519>honor<s%>, be not you <S%H3161>united<s%>: for in their <S%H639>anger<s%> they <S%H2026>killed<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%>, and in their <S%H7522>selfwill<s%> they dug <S%H6131>down<s%> a <S%H7794>wall<s%>.

<S%H779>Cursed<s%> be their <S%H639>anger<s%>, for it was <S%H5794>fierce<s%>; and their <S%H5678>wrath<s%>, for it was <S%H7185>cruel<s%>: I will <S%H2505>divide<s%> them in <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and <S%H6327>scatter<s%> them in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

<S%H3063>Judah<s%>, you are he whom your <S%H251>brothers<s%> shall <S%H3034>praise<s%>: your <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall be in the <S%H6203>neck<s%> of your <S%H341>enemies<s%>; your <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall bow down before <S%H7812>you<s%>

<S%H3063>Judah<s%> is a <S%H738>lion<s%>'s <S%H1482>whelp<s%>: from the <S%H2964>prey<s%>, my <S%H1121>son<s%>, you are gone <S%H5927>up<s%>: he stooped <S%H3766>down<s%>, he <S%H7257>crouched<s%> as a <S%H738>lion<s%>, and as an old <S%H3833>lion<s%>; who shall rouse him <S%H6965>up<s%>?

The <S%H7626>scepter<s%> shall not <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, nor a <S%H2710>lawgiver<s%> from between his <S%H7272>feet<s%>, <S%H3588>until<s%> <S%H7886>Shiloh<s%> <S%H935>come<s%>; and unto him shall the <S%H3349>gathering<s%> of the people <S%H5971>be<s%>.

<S%H631>Binding<s%> his <S%H5895>foal<s%> unto the <S%H1612>vine<s%>, and his <S%H860>donkey<s%>'s <S%H1121>colt<s%> unto the choice <S%H8321>vine<s%>; he <S%H3526>washed<s%> his <S%H3830>garments<s%> in <S%H3196>wine<s%>, and his <S%H5497>clothes<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H6025>grapes<s%>:
His <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall be <S%H2447>red<s%> with <S%H3196>wine<s%>, and his <S%H8127>teeth<s%> <S%H3836>white<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%>.

<S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> shall <S%H7931>live<s%> at the <S%H2348>haven<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>; and he shall be for an <S%H2348>haven<s%> of <S%H591>ships<s%>; and his <S%H3411>border<s%> shall be unto <S%H6721>Zidon<s%>.
<S%H3485>Issachar<s%> is a <S%H1634>strong<s%> <S%H2543>donkey<s%> couching <S%H7257>down<s%> between two <S%H4942>burdens<s%>:

And he <S%H7200>saw<s%> that <S%H4496>rest<s%> was <S%H2896>good<s%>, and the <S%H776>land<s%> that it was <S%H5276>pleasant<s%>; and <S%H5186>bowed<s%> his <S%H7926>shoulder<s%> to <S%H5445>bear<s%>, and became a <S%H5647>servant<s%> unto <S%H4522>tribute<s%>.
<S%H1835>Dan<s%> shall <S%H1777>judge<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%>, as <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

<S%H1835>Dan<s%> shall be a <S%H5175>serpent<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%>, an <S%H8207>adder<s%> in the <S%H734>path<s%>, that <S%H5391>bites<s%> the <S%H5483>horse<s%> <S%H6119>heels<s%>, so that his <S%H7392>rider<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H268>backward<s%>.
I have waited <S%H6960>for<s%> your <S%H3444>salvation<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
<S%H1410>Gad<s%>, a <S%H1416>troop<s%> shall <S%H1464>overcome<s%> <S%H1464>him<s%>: but he shall overcome at the <S%H6119>last<s%>.
Out of <S%H836>Asher<s%> his <S%H3899>bread<s%> shall be <S%H8082>fat<s%>, and he shall <S%H5414>yield<s%> <S%H4428>royal<s%> <S%H4574>dainties<s%>.
<S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> is a <S%H355>doe<s%> let <S%H7971>loose<s%>: he <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H8233>goodly<s%> <S%H561>words<s%>.

<S%H3130>Joseph<s%> is a <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> <S%H1121>bough<s%>, even a <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> <S%H1121>bough<s%> by a <S%H5869>well<s%>; whose <S%H1323>branches<s%> <S%H6805>run<s%> over the <S%H7791>wall<s%>:
The <S%H1167>archers<s%> have severely grieved <S%H4843>him<s%>, and <S%H7232>shot<s%> at <S%H7852>him<s%>, and hated him:

But his <S%H7198>bow<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H386>strength<s%>, and the <S%H2220>arms<s%> of his <S%H3027>hands<s%> were made <S%H6339>strong<s%> by the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H46>mighty<s%> God of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>; (from there is the <S%H7462>shepherd<s%>, the <S%H68>stone<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>:)

Even by the <S%H410>God<s%> of your <S%H1>father<s%>, who shall <S%H5826>help<s%> you and <S%H854>by<s%> the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%>, who shall <S%H1288>bless<s%> you with <S%H1293>blessings<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H5920>above<s%>, <S%H1293>blessings<s%> of the <S%H8415>deep<s%> that <S%H7257>crouches<s%> <S%H1293>under<s%>, blessings of the <S%H7699>breasts<s%>, and of the <S%H7356>womb<s%>:

The <S%H1293>blessings<s%> of your <S%H1>father<s%> have <S%H1396>prevailed<s%> above the <S%H1293>blessings<s%> of my <S%H2029>ancestors<s%> unto the farthest <S%H8379>bound<s%> of the <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1389>hills<s%>: they shall be on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, and on the crown of the <S%H6936>head<s%> of him that was <S%H5139>separate<s%> from his <S%H251>brothers<s%>.

<S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> shall be as <S%H2963>hungry<s%> as a <S%H2061>wolf<s%>: in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> he shall <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H5706>prey<s%>, and at <S%H6153>night<s%> he shall <S%H2505>divide<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil<s%>.

All these are the <S%H6240>twelve<s%> <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and this is it that their <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto <S%H1288>them<s%>, and blessed <S%H834>them<s%>; every <S%H376>one<s%> according to his <S%H1293>blessing<s%> he blessed <S%H1288>them<s%>.

And he <S%H6680>charged<s%> <S%H559>them<s%>, and said unto <S%H622>them<s%>, I am to be gathered unto my <S%H5971>people<s%>: <S%H6912>bury<s%> me with my <S%H1>fathers<s%> in the <S%H4631>cave<s%> that is in the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H6085>Ephron<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite<s%>,

In the <S%H4631>cave<s%> that is in the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H4375>Machpelah<s%>, which is <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4471>Mamre<s%>, in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, which <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H7069>bought<s%> with the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H6085>Ephron<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite<s%> for a <S%H272>possession<s%> of a <S%H6913>buryingplace<s%>.

There they <S%H6912>buried<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> and <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%>; there they <S%H6912>buried<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> and <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%>; and there I <S%H6912>buried<s%> <S%H3812>Leah<s%>.
The <S%H4735>purchase<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> and of the <S%H4631>cave<s%> that is in it was from the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth<s%>.

And when <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H6680>commanding<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, he gathered <S%H622>up<s%> his <S%H7272>feet<s%> into the <S%H4296>bed<s%>, and yielded up the <S%H1478>ghost<s%>, and was <S%H622>gathered<s%> unto his <S%H5971>people<s%>.
